feed.title: Combined summary - [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Sapio Primer

entry.title: Combined summary - [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Sapio Primer
entry.summary: Jeremy Rubin has introduced Sapio, a system for expressing Bitcoin ideas that has made significant progress since its previous mention. It is considered an excellent platform for expressing Bitcoin ideas, even if not intended for production implementation. Rubin provides links to more comprehensive documentation and emphasizes the importance of getting comfortable with Sapio as future posts in the series will heavily depend on it.
